column1: Little Goat Diner////I'll probably come back if I can get into a private event on the roof. Unfortunately
column2: the chicken pot pie was almost as expensive as the burger and it was only the size of one of the buns. On top of that
column3: or waitress never asked how the food was and only stopped by to fill our waters. Obviously
column5: but I had a better conversation with the guy who brought out my leaning tower of goat meat.
